content: an evening at julie s by katie pomper guess where i first started working on this hat yep i was having a lovely evening at my friend julie s house much like the design on the hat conversations with julie can go every which way and are thoroughly enjoyable hanging out with a great friend is always a welcomed experience and just like this hat it leaves you warm inside awe shucks right materials needed 90 yards of a super bulky weight yarn for this hat i used a skein of malabrigo rasta in the baya electrica colourway 8 00mm and 9 00mm needles on a 16 cord or whatever size that lets you achieve gauge plus 9 00mm dpn s/magic loop for decrease section 1 stitch marker gauge 10sts per 4 /10cm be sure your darning needle scissors gauge is correct as i ended up using 93% of one skein of malabrigo rasta abbreviations and special techniques k knit rt right twist knit into the next 2 stitches as if to k2tog pull yarn through but before you slip p purl the 2 stitches off the left needle knit into the bor beginning of round first stitch once more finish by slipping both stitches off the left needle pm place marker lt left twist knit into the 2nd stitch on the rm remove marker left needle through the back loop pull yarn sl1 slip_stitch purl-wise through and bring right needle to the front and k2tog knit 2 stitches together knit into the first stitch finish by slipping both stitches off the left needle ssk slip 2 stitches one at a time knit-wise from the left needle to the right keeping psso pass slipped stitch over knit stitch both stitches facing in this
